chara.textHome:
When I woke up I wasn't able to
remember anything except my first name.

But Umika and Kaoru came to get me,
and then we went to this big house
where we apparently lived together.
I felt relaxed right away, just like magic!

Even though I still can't remember a thing...
Weird, huh?

Of all things, I remember how to
season things just right!

Just give it a little taste, fix it up
...and it's perfect!
The magic word is...
Abracannoli!
Something's surging within me...
I can sense it! My magic got stronger!
Ooh, this feels good!
My mind's all crystal clear now!

A Witch hit the Soul Gem on my ear,
and that was the spark that made me
transform for the first time...
Somehow I remembered how to fight.
Not with my mind, but with my body!

Back when I fought together with
Umika and Kaoru, I remembered
how they both moved in battle.

Kaoru stopped the enemy from moving,
while Umika read its weakness!

But back then I wasn't in
step with them at all...
Ciao! So, you came! Good to see you!
Wait just a second though!
Um...I'm still in the middle of eating!
I'm gonna eat every last bite!
Ciao!
What should we have for breakfast?
Huh, a Spotabaddynoff?

That's kind of heavy first thing in 
the morning,

but...it sounds tasty!
Wait just a minute while I go make it!
It's almost noon... I'm getting pretty hungry.
What should we eat?
Bucket pudding?
Umm...
Yeah! Sounds great!

When I used magic for the first time
after waking up, I immediately
fell over and passed out...
Cause I hadn't eaten dinner yet!
*Yawn* I'm starting to get sleepy...
I ate so much again today...
Yeah, I think I'm gonna sleep really well.

When I get a teensy bit hungry
I always want to eat something,

so I always try to have some chocolate 
or something on hand, y'know?

I still don't remember a thing,
but regardless time keeps on flowing.
That just means I gotta keep moving!
I'm still not used to using magic yet...
I hope that's okay?
I guess all I can do is try my best!
Yeah, I've got this!

Sometimes I feel like a prisoner
to the past me,

but memories aren't what make a person... 
A person's footprints are what make their
memories...
That's how I try to think of it now.
Here you go!
This is for you.

There's lots of candy and treats inside!
All of my favorite snacks...
I call it the Kazumix!
Okay, here I go! Watch closely now...
Open sesame seeds!
Wait...it didn't work...
I can't open the door...
Maybe I got the spell wrong?
Umika and Kaoru cut my hair for me.

They said I never asked
them to do that before.
That's what makes it perfect for present me!

When Umika gets a really bad case of
writer's block, horns pop out of her head!
Only Kaoru and I can see them, though.
*Giggle* Isn't that funny?
Kaoru battles like she's playing soccer!

She's always perfectly in sync with
Umika too.
They're really amazing!

I think the past me's memories are chiseled
deep into my body,

and the present me is etching
new memories on top of them...

I wonder if I'll ever get
my old memories back.
But if I do...
what will happen to the present me?

In stories, people who disrespect food
are the true villains and don't even live
to see the credits!
So don't leave any food on your plate, okay?
Hey! Don't you dare cause any more trouble!
Gosh... I'm really hungry...
Okay! Now let's go get something to eat!
We were totally breathing in sync!
I...can fight!
Hm?
Where am I?
What, my name? My name's...
Kazumi!

But I forgot my last name...
and where I live, too!

What am I gonna do?
I can't remember anything!
And...I'm staaarving!
Um...does this mean...I got stronger?
Okay! I can feel it!
I'm getting better at this!
I don't get a lot of what's going on yet...
But I will, right?

I lost all my memories,
but I can easily remember how to cook.

It's like as long as I have the ingredients,
my hands just move on their own...

I started chopping up ingredients and
preparing things before I even knew
I was cooking!
I'm the one doing all this, but it feels alien...
Oh well! That's the real fun part!
